title: Help
body:
While at the end of the game my team and I had very bad lag.

I maintained 43 ping throughout the game and during lag
so not internet
thoughgts?
When we won and god to the victory splash I could money the mouse from one screen to my second screen but my main screen was locked up with the clients victory splash and i could task manager out of it. so i had to pull the plug on my computer the rectify.

thoughts?

replies.body: Since your ping is at a steady 43 it sounds like this 'lag' might be caused by packet loss, which means that some of the information going between your network and our servers is getting lost or corrupted along the way. Take your game logs that had these issues, toss them into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743), and then let me know what it says about your packet loss!

Well damn, you might have some major issues then {{item:3070}} ...

I'm guessing that you either had really high ping, or a high % of packet loss. If the log reader was able to provide some troubleshooting steps, it might be best to try those first. If not, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that our tech guys can take a closer look. Be sure to attach those logs to your ticket as well!

Seems like a one time thing so far.

said i had .48% packetloss

if it happens again ill troubleshoot it.

I just wasnt sure i yall were having issues on your side
It was only one game. how do i do this?
